TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextReturnReader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeReturnReader

summary.span: 从使用 HTTP 实现但不支持 SOAP 的 Web 服务客户端的 HTTP 响应文本中读取返回值。

span.span: Reads return values from HTTP response text for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和中的其他类命名空间支持通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的 Web 服务的.NET Framework 的实现。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服务编写器和读卡器序列化和反序列化，分别的参数或返回对象的 Web 方法的 HTTP 请求或响应流之间。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服务编写器和读卡器使用 HTTP 传输，但不交换使用 SOAP 标准的消息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 类实现为 Web 方法返回值的非 XML 文本的客户端读取。The class implements the client-side reading of non-XML text into Web method return values. 若要获取返回值，文本进行编码的 HTTP 响应的正文中时，分析使用正则表达式模式匹配所指定的属性，此方法可用于客户端代理类中的 Web 方法。To obtain a return value, the text, which is encoded in the body of an HTTP response, is parsed using regular expression pattern matching, as specified by the attribute , which can be applied to a Web method in a client proxy class. 类调用类来实际执行模式匹配。The class calls the class to actually perform the pattern matching. 文本模式匹配提供 Web 服务应检索 HTML 内容，而不将其转换为必须绑定到 XML 架构定义的 XML 文档的方法。Text pattern matching provides a way for Web services to retrieve HTML content without converting it to XML documents that must be bound to XML Schema definitions. 在通过 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中未指定正则表达式搜索目标`match`中的 XML 元素`text`元素。Regular expression search targets are specified in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document via `match` XML elements within `text` elements. 这两个元素属于命名空间http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/。Both elements belong to the namespace http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/. 当**匹配**元素指定在 WSDL 文档，Wsdl.exe 工具将应用特性来生成客户端代理类中的相应 Web 方法。When **match** elements are specified in a WSDL document, the Wsdl.exe tool applies attributes to the corresponding Web methods in the client proxy class that is generated. 此外，代替使用，用于反序列化 Web 方法的默认类通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作返回的 Web 服务的.NET Framework 的实现根据的值。Also, is used in place of , the default class for deserializing Web method return values according to the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. 你通常不需要使用类直接。You typically will not need to use the class directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetInitializer(class System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo methodInfo) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetInitializer (methodInfo As LogicalMethodInfo) As Object

param.name: methodInfo
param.span: ，指定为其获取初始值设定项的 Web 方法。

span.span: A that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.

summary.span: 返回指定方法的初始值设定项。

span.span: Returns an initializer for the specified method.

returns.span: 指定方法的初始值设定项

span.span: An initializer for the specified method

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值设定项是作为参数传递一个对象方法。An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the method. 有关类，初始值设定项是根据 Web 方法的返回类型的对象。For the class, the initializer is a object based on the return type of the Web method. 服务初始化期间调用方法。The method is invoked during service initialization. 更高版本，在处理响应时，初始值设定项对象传递给方法的另一个实例。Later, at the time a response is processed, the initializer object is passed to the method of another instance. 另一个实例执行实际的读取。The other instance performs the actual reading.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(object o) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (o As Object)

param.name: o
param.span: 一个 对象，用于正在调用的 Web 方法的返回类型。

span.span: A object for the return type of the Web method being invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供使用对象方法，以便分析 HTTP 响应中包含的文本。The method supplies the object used by the method to parse text contained in the HTTP response. 在处理请求时调用方法。The method is invoked at the time a request is processed. 输入的参数， `o`，通过调用获取方法在客户端初始化期间获取的类的另一个实例。The input parameter, `o`, is obtained by calling the method on another instance of the class that is obtained during client initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object Read (System.Net.WebResponse response, System.IO.Stream responseStream);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object Read(class System.Net.WebResponse response, class System.IO.Stream responseStream) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (response As WebResponse, responseStream As Stream) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ Read(System::Net::WebResponse ^ response, System::IO::Stream ^ responseStream);

param.name: response
param.span: 一个 对象，它包含某个操作的输出消息。

span.span: A object containing the output message for an operation.

param.name: responseStream
param.span: 一个 ，其内容是由 response 参数表示的 HTTP 响应的正文。

span.span: A whose content is the body of the HTTP response represented by the response parameter.

summary.span: 分析包含在 HTTP 响应中的文本。

span.span: Parses text contained in the HTTP response.

returns.span: 一个包含反序列化的 Web 方法返回值的对象。

span.span: An object containing the deserialized Web method return value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要分析的文本内容的 HTTP 响应，类的实现方法使用对象作为参数传递方法。To parse the text content of the HTTP response, the class's implementation of the method uses the object passed as an argument to the method. 在返回反序列化的 Web 方法返回值之前，它关闭响应流。It closes the response stream before returning the deserialized Web method return value.
